p: The Lianhua-Qingwen capsule material (Lot No. B1602001) was provided by Shijiazhuang Yiling Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd (Shijiazhuang city, China). The drug was dissolved by DMSO into 500â€‰mg/mL and diluted using MEM to operational concentration before experiment (in vitro). Oseltamivir was obtained from Roche Co., Ltd. (Basel, Switzerland). Ribavirin was purchased from Star Lake Bioscience Co., Ltd. (Zhaoqing city, China).
